players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
You: "I'm shocked about Bob too. We need to figure out who could have done this. Charlie, do you have any suspicions about who might be the mafioso?"
You: "Diana, you've been very quiet. What are your thoughts on what happened to Bob? Any suspicions about who might be responsible?"

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all work together to uncover the truth about what happened to Bob. Let's keep an open mind and share any information or suspicions we may have, no matter how small they might seem."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
